org.carrot2.mahout.math

Interface Vector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<Vector.Element>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMatrix.TransposeViewVector, AbstractVector, DenseVector, MatrixVectorView, RandomAccessSparseVector, SequentialAccessSparseVector, VectorView

    public interface Vector
extends Cloneable, Iterable<Vector.Element>
